title: Pennsylvania Manhunt Widens For Ex-Marine
teaser: Bradley Stone, an Iraq war combat veteran, is thought to have killed his ex-wife and five relatives yesterday.
contentencoded:
A manhunt is underway in the suburbs north of Philadelphia for Bradley Stone, the Iraq war combat veteran who is thought to have killed his ex-wife and five relatives yesterday in a child custody dispute.

Here & Now‘s Robin Young speaks with Tom MacDonald, a reporter for WHYY who is covering the story from Pennsburg, Penn.

Guest

  • Tom MacDonald, reporter for WHYY in Philadelphia. He tweets @TMacDonaldWHYY.
